<title level="1" right="Focus 5" pfs="Standard">[Unblinking Flame Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=1244)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 222</row>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You focus your sight inside and call on your inner fire to grant you warmth, steady your vision, and soothe your body. You recover 15 Hit Points. For the duration, you gain a +2 status bonus on Perception checks and resistance 10 to cold.

---
**Heightened (+1)** You recover an additional 3 Hit Points, and the resistance to cold increases by 2.
name: Unblinking Flame Aura
